name: basic ridge headband
sizes_available: 8 sizes: baby 0-3 months,  baby 3-6 months, baby 6-12 months, toddler 1-3 years, child 3-10 years, teen/adult small, adult medium, adult large
notes:
* please note this is the ad-free, easy to print, pdf version of this pattern. you can find the free version on my blog, www.theturtletrunk.com *

the basic ridge headband is a beginner friendly, crochet headband/ear warmer pattern that includes 8 sizes for all ages, sizes, and genders. it features a fun texture that easy to create. it's the perfect accessory for fall and winter!

includes 8 sizes: baby 0-3 months,  baby 3-6 months, baby 6-12 months, toddler 1-3 years, child 3-10 years, teen/adult small, adult medium, adult large

difficulty: beginner / easy

standard us crochet terms

language: english

pattern includes:
- detailed written instructions for 8 sizes
- gauge pattern
- link to the free video tutorial

supplies needed: medium (4) weight yarn (41-82 yards), 5.00mm (h) hook, yarn needle, and scissors
